meanings.definition: The quality or state of causing harm or injury.
meanings.sent1: The harmfulness of the situation was evident in the injuries sustained.
meanings.sent2: The harmfulness of smoking is well-known for its negative effects on health.
meanings.sent3: The harmfulness of the prank was revealed when it backfired hilariously.
meanings.sent4: The harmfulness of gossip can be as damaging as a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The harmfulness of the chemical was like a silent danger lurking in the air.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is harmful.
meanings.sent1: The harmfulness of the substance was measured by its toxic levels.
meanings.sent2: She assessed the harmfulness of the situation before taking action.
meanings.sent3: The harmfulness of the spicy food was evident when everyone reached for water.
meanings.sent4: The harmfulness of the storm was like a fierce beast unleashed upon the town.
meanings.sent5: The harmfulness of neglecting safety precautions was highlighted by the accident.
